alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 8:34PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CST FOR EASTERN BENTON AND EASTERN IOWA COUNTIES... At 834 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shellsburg to near Oxford, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A 65 mph wind gust was measured in Atkins at 832 PM. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Vinton, Marengo, Williamsburg, Atkins, Walford, Urbana, North English, Shellsburg, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Norway, Parnell, Amana, Conroy, Middle Amana, Vinton Memorial Airport, Upper South Amana, East Amana and High Amana. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southeastern, northeastern and east central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
